tags.param:
props.id id associated with the TextInput component.
props.label Text shown in bold above the input element.
props.description Text that gives more detail about the requirements for the input.
props.optional Whether or not the field is optional.
props.disabled Whether or not the field is currently disabled.
props.onChange Callback to be executed when the value of the input field changes.
props.onBlur Callback to be executed when the input stops being focused.
props.placeholder The placeholder text shown in the input field before the user begins typing.
props.errorMessage The message shown below the input field if the value is invalid.
props.successMessage The message shown below the input field if the value is valid.
props.state The current state of the TextInput. This can be none, valid, or error.
props.value The current value of the input field. If a value is passed to this prop, component will be controlled by consumer.
props.className className supplied to the TextInput container.
props.darkMode determines whether or not the component appears in dark theme.
props.sizeVariant determines the size of the text and the height of the input.

description:
# TextInput

TextInput component

```
<TextInput label='Input Label' onChange={() => execute when value of input field changes}/>
```

disabled.name: disabled
disabled.description:
Whether or not the field is disabled. This will set the `aria-disabled` and `readonly` attributes on the input, not the `disabled` attribute.
Default: false

placeholder.name: placeholder
placeholder.description: The placeholder text shown in the input field before the user begins typing.

value.name: value
value.description: The current value of the input field. If a value is passed to this prop, component will be controlled by consumer.

onChange.name: onChange
onChange.description: Callback to be executed when the value of the input field changes.

className.name: className
className.description: className supplied to the TextInput container.

id.name: id
id.description: id associated with the TextInput component.

onBlur.name: onBlur
onBlur.description: Callback to be executed when the input stops being focused.

description.name: description
description.description: Text that gives more detail about the requirements for the input.

optional.name: optional
optional.description:
Whether or not the field is optional.
Default: false

errorMessage.name: errorMessage
errorMessage.description: The message shown below the input field if the value is invalid.

successMessage.name: successMessage
successMessage.description: The message shown below the input field if the value is valid.

state.name: state
state.description: The current state of the TextInput. This can be none, valid, or error.

handleValidation.name: handleValidation
handleValidation.description:
Callback called whenever validation should be run.

See [Form Validation & Error Handling](https://www.mongodb.design/foundation/forms/#form-validation--error-handling) for more

sizeVariant.name: sizeVariant
sizeVariant.description: determines the font size and padding.

baseFontSize.name: baseFontSize
baseFontSize.description: determines the base font size if sizeVariant is set to default.

darkMode.name: darkMode
darkMode.description: Renders the component with dark mode styles.

data-lgid.name: data-lgid
data-lgid.description: LG test id passed to the component wrapper.

label.name: label
label.description:
Text shown in bold above the input element.

Optional if `aria-labelledby` or `aria-label` is provided

aria-labelledby.name: aria-labelledby
aria-labelledby.description:
Screen-reader label element.

Optional if `label` or `aria-label` is provided

aria-label.name: aria-label
aria-label.description:
Screen reader label text

Optional if `label` or `aria-labelledby` is provided

props.onChange Callback to be executed when the value of the input field changes.

props.placeholder The placeholder text shown in the input field before the user begins typing.
props.errorMessage The message shown below the input field if the value is invalid.

props.state The current state of the TextInput. This can be none, valid, or error.
props.value The current value of the input field. If a value is passed to this prop, component will be controlled by consumer.
props.className className supplied to the TextInput container.
props.darkMode determines whether or not the component appears in dark theme.
props.sizeVariant determines the size of the text and the height of the input.

at.name: at
at.description:
Takes an integer value and returns the item at that index,
allowing for positive and negative integers.
Negative integers count back from the last item in the array.
